price:
84. Waxaan ku awood siinnay dhulka, waxaana u siinnay wax walba sabab 
 (cilmi).
arabic: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ سَبَبٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā makkannā lahu fī al-arḍi waātaynāhu min kulli shayin sababan
